SEARCH

所有类和接口

类
说明
AdvancedRobot
The AdvancedRobot class represents a robot with advanced movement logic.
BasicRobot
The BasicRobot class represents a simple robot with basic movement logic.
ConfigManager
The ConfigManager class provides methods for saving and loading the state of a RobotArena to and from a file.
Direction
The Direction enum represents the possible directions a robot can face and move.
Main
The main application entry point, which initializes and sets up the main interface, menu bar, and interactions with RobotArena and RobotCanvas.
Obstacle
The Obstacle class represents an obstacle in the robot arena.
Robot
The abstract Robot class serves as a base for all robot types, providing common properties and methods.
RobotArena
The RobotArena class represents a simulation environment for managing and controlling multiple robots.
RobotArena.RobotType
An enum defining the types of robots that can be added to the arena.
RobotCanvas
The RobotCanvas class represents a graphical canvas for visualizing robots and obstacles in a RobotArena.
SensorRobot
The SensorRobot class represents a robot with advanced movement logic that can detect and avoid obstacles.
SensorRobot.Point
A helper class used to represent a point on the grid with X and Y coordinates.
